text: Chitari is located about 163 km southeast of Udaipur, Rajasthan. ==Demography== There are 1219 houses in village. India census, Chitari has a population of 5545. Males constitute 2699 of the population and females 2846. Chitari has an average literacy rate of 56%, lower than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 67%, and female literacy is 47%. In Chitari, 14.42% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==Notes and references== Category:Cities and towns in Dungarpur district
title: Chitari Dungarpur
